DOC.criteria: Be healthy , ambulatory female age 25 45 year old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20 35 kg/m2 ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , brief physical examination , include vital sign , clinical laboratory test ) Consume habitual caffeine intake ( < 300 mg/day < /= 2 caffeinated drinks/day ) Pregnant , plan become pregnant lactating female Using ephedra caffeinecontaining product chronic medication contraceptive HRT Lost gain five pound weight precede three month Engage intense physical activity Use tobacco nicotine product A medical history know thyroid disease , blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg , diabetes , depression , psychiatric disorder , glaucoma , seizure disorder relevant illness interfere trial opinion Investigator
